articles.content: A high-profile entertainment marketing consultant was targeted by a woman who had been stalking and threatening a film director friend of his before she fatally shot him after her forcing her way ins… [+4819 chars]

articles.title: Video: Felicity Huffman finally speaking out about college admissions scandal - CNN
articles.description: CNN’s Stephanie Elam reports on actress Felicity Huffman opening up about her role in a college admissions scandal that landed her in federal prison.
